name: L1_Bridge
description: L1_Bridge is responsible for the bonding and challenging of TransferRoots. All TransferRoots originate in the L1_Bridge through `bondTransferRoot` and are propagated up to destination L2s.

functionDecorators.name: bondTransferRoot
functionDecorators.description: Used by the bonder to bond a TransferRoot and propagate it up to destination L2s.

parameterDecorators.name: _transferRootHash
parameterDecorators.description: The Merkle root of the TransferRoot Merkle tree.

parameterDecorators.name: _chainIds
parameterDecorators.description: The ids of the destination chains.

parameterDecorators.name: _chainAmounts
parameterDecorators.description: The amounts destined for each destination chain.

functionDecorators.name: bondWithdrawal
functionDecorators.description: Allows the bonder to bond individual withdrawals before their TransferRoot has been committed.

parameterDecorators.name: _sender
parameterDecorators.description: The address sending the Transfer.

parameterDecorators.name: _recipient
parameterDecorators.description: The address receiving the Transfer.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount being transferred including the `_relayerFee`.

parameterDecorators.name: _transferNonce
parameterDecorators.description: Used to avoid transferHash collisions.

parameterDecorators.name: _relayerFee
parameterDecorators.description: The amount paid to the address that withdraws the Transfer.

functionDecorators.name: confirmTransferRoot
functionDecorators.description: Used by an L2 bridge to confirm a TransferRoot via cross-domain message. Once a TransferRoot has been confirmed, any challenge against that TransferRoot can be resolved as unsuccessful.

parameterDecorators.name: _transferRootHash
parameterDecorators.description: The Merkle root of the TransferRoot Merkle tree.

parameterDecorators.name: _chainIds
parameterDecorators.description: The ids of the destination chains.

parameterDecorators.name: _chainAmounts
parameterDecorators.description: The amounts destined for each destination chain.

functionDecorators.name: getAmountHash
functionDecorators.description: Get the hash of the destination chainIds for a given TransferRoot and their respective amounts.

parameterDecorators.name: _chainIds
parameterDecorators.description: The chainIds of all networks receiving Transfers in a given TransferRoot.

parameterDecorators.name: _amounts
parameterDecorators.description: The amounts destined for each _chainId.

functionDecorators.name: getBondedWithdrawalAmount
functionDecorators.description: Get the TransferRoot for a given rootHash.

parameterDecorators.name: _transferHash
parameterDecorators.description: The Transfer's unique identifier.

functionDecorators.name: getChainId
functionDecorators.description: getChainId can be overridden by subclasses if needed for compatibility or testing purposes. Get the current chainId.

functionDecorators.name: getTransferHash
functionDecorators.description: Get the hash that represents an individual Transfer.

parameterDecorators.name: _chainId
parameterDecorators.description: The id of the destination chain.

parameterDecorators.name: _sender
parameterDecorators.description: The address sending the Transfer.

parameterDecorators.name: _recipient
parameterDecorators.description: The address receiving the Transfer.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount being transferred including the `_relayerFee`.

parameterDecorators.name: _transferNonce
parameterDecorators.description: Used to avoid transferHash collisions.

parameterDecorators.name: _relayerFee
parameterDecorators.description: The amount paid to the address that withdraws the Transfer.

parameterDecorators.name: _amountOutMin
parameterDecorators.description: The minimum amount received after attempting to swap in the destination Uniswap market. 0 if no swap is intended.

parameterDecorators.name: _deadline
parameterDecorators.description: The deadline for swapping in the destination Uniswap market. 0 if no swap is intended.

functionDecorators.name: getTransferRoot
functionDecorators.description: Get the TransferRoot for a given rootHash.

parameterDecorators.name: _rootHash
parameterDecorators.description: The merkle root of the TransferRoot.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: settleBondedWithdrawal
functionDecorators.description: Refunds the bonders stake from a bonded withdrawal and counts that withdrawal against its TransferRoot.

parameterDecorators.name: _transferHash
parameterDecorators.description: The Transfer's unique identifier.

parameterDecorators.name: _rootHash
parameterDecorators.description: The merkle root of the TransferRoot.

parameterDecorators.name: _proof
parameterDecorators.description: The Merkle proof that proves the Transfer's inclusion in the TransferRoot.

functionDecorators.name: stake
functionDecorators.description: Allows the bonder to deposit tokens and increase its credit balance.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount being staked.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: unstake
functionDecorators.description: Allows the bonder to withdraw any available balance and add to its debit balance.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount being staked.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Can be called by anyone (recipient or relayer). Withdraw a Transfer from its destination bridge.

parameterDecorators.name: _sender
parameterDecorators.description: The address sending the Transfer.

parameterDecorators.name: _recipient
parameterDecorators.description: The address receiving the Transfer.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount being transferred including the `_relayerFee`.

parameterDecorators.name: _transferNonce
parameterDecorators.description: Used to avoid transferHash collisions.

parameterDecorators.name: _relayerFee
parameterDecorators.description: The amount paid to the address that withdraws the Transfer.

parameterDecorators.name: _transferRootHash
parameterDecorators.description: The Merkle root of the TransferRoot.

parameterDecorators.name: _proof
parameterDecorators.description: The Merkle proof that proves the Transfer's inclusion in the TransferRoot.
